column2: Bomb threat on American Air flight in New York proves false alarm NEW YORK
column3: Nov 30 An American Airlines  airplane that was evacuated at New York's John F. Kennedy International Airport after a bomb threat has been searched and cleared for service

column2: UPDATE 1-Kellogg raises stakes in bidding war over Egypt's Bisco Misr CAIRO
column3: Nov 30 Kellogg Co raised its bid on Sunday for Egyptian cake and biscuit maker Bisco Misr
column4: intensifying a bidding war with the UAE's Abraaj Investment Management that has pushed up the offer price by more than 12 percent. ~
